timeline.message:
Add struct

Now we can define jnr style structure, and access field just like jnr-fuse.

Add AlluxioJniFuse.java & AlluxioJniFuseFileSystem.java

Most codes are copied from former AlluxioFuse.

Add libjnifuse

Now we can run basic read-only AlluxioFuseFileSystem.
NOTE: jni cache is not supported.
Cleanup AlluxioFuse to reduce PR footprint

Fix AlluxioFuseFileSystemTest

not actually fixed Timespec error. I just umcommented it
Replace jnr utils with jni utils

Improve Makefile

New bug detected: JNI memory leak.
Test AlluxioFuse read performance with 64 threads, OOM occured:

Merge branch 'fuse' of github.com:Alluxio/alluxio into fuse

timeline.bodyText:
@iluoeli we are using 4-space indent rather than 8. Checkout https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/contributor/Code-Conventions.html#coding-style for the Eclipse Code Formatter or Eclipse Code Formatter Plugin
Let's avoid introducing unnecessary change in a PR which increases the footprint and slows down code review
timeline.author: apc999

replies.bodyText: actually for this file, let's simple leave it unchanged as what is in master branch.
replies.author: apc999
